idea-plugin.name: Maven Dependency Checker
idea-plugin.description:
Shows all available new versions of the Maven dependencies used by your project.
    • No need to add the versions-maven-plugin to your POM build configuration
      No need to look up every dependency manually at Maven Central

    • Caveats:
    • Only dependencies available at Maven Central will be checked for updates
        The plugin won't update your dependencies by changing your POM file

action.description: Checks all Maven project dependencies for updates
